name: Reflective journal Entities
text:
week 1: meeting the ceo and exploring carclarity's business model 
d - describe 
during this week, i had the invaluable opportunity to engage with various key individuals at carclarity, 
including the ceo, department heads, and team members. these interactions provided me with a 
comprehensive understanding of the company's trade demonstration. i met anil from the product team, 
phil from marketing, and bella from design. through these engagements, i delved into the customer 
lifecycle, starting from initial interaction with the company and progressing to revenue conversion. 
additionally, i learned about the diverse sources of information that the marketing team use, such as 
google ads, facebook, sms, and the klaviyo email marketing platform. i also discovered that the product 
team collaborates with a team in india, considering factors like time differences and providing access to 
remote team members. 
i - interpret 
meeting with the ceo and gaining insights into the company's trade show operations was truly 
enlightening. the abundance of data collected from various sources and its strategic utilization in driving 
marketing efforts has left a profound impression on me. moreover, witnessing the coordination efforts 
between product teams in different countries underscored the significance of effective communication 
and collaboration in a global business environment. this experience has heightened my awareness of the 
interconnectedness of different departments within a company and how they work in synergy to achieve 
common goals. 
e - evaluate 
in the overall evaluation, i found this week's experiences to be highly compelling and instrumental in 
fulfilling the objectives of my internship. engaging with the ceo and other team members greatly 
enhanced my understanding of the company's trade show and its inner workings. learning about the 
various data sources and their utilization by the marketing team demonstrated the immense potential of 
data-driven marketing initiatives. the coordination efforts of the product team further emphasized the 
importance of communication and collaboration in a global business context. 
p - plan 
moving forward, i intend to utilize the knowledge gained this week to enhance my performance as a 
learner and make more meaningful contributions to the company's success. i recommend that carclarity 
continues to prioritize communication and collaboration efforts among different departments and teams, 
especially those working remotely. additionally, i believe that further analysis of the data collected from 
diverse sources will lead to even more effective marketing endeavors. this learning experience will 
undoubtedly serve me well in my future pursuit of a career in the business world. i am enthusiastic about 
the continued learning and growth opportunities that my internship at carclarity holds. 
week 2 reflective journal: learning jira, confluence, and integrating slack with jira

during the second week of my internship, i focused on learning about jira and confluence, two important 
software tools used by my team. i spent time exploring the features and functionalities of these tools to 
understand how data is collected, processed, and utilized within the company. i also integrated slack with 
jira to enable the generation of issues and tickets through slack, including all the necessary details to 
address any problems or bugs. to achieve this, i had to customize a checkbox in slack by modifying the 
json file. additionally, i maintained regular communication with sam khadivizand to receive feedback and 
update 
him 
on 
my 
progress.

i – interpret 
gaining knowledge about jira and confluence provided me with a better understanding of how my team 
tracks and manages project tasks, issues, and bugs. integrating slack with jira was a new experience for 
me, and it helped me grasp the concept of automation and integration between different software tools. 
collaborating closely with sam khadivizand improved my communication skills and allowed me to receive 
valuable feedback on my work. overall, this experience highlighted the importance of learning new 
software tools and being open to different ways of working. 
e - evaluate 
i found the second week to be a valuable learning experience in terms of achieving my internship goals. 
by gaining hands-on experience with jira and confluence, i expanded my skill set and gained a better 
understanding of my team's workflow. although integrating slack with jira presented some challenges, it 
provided me with insights into automation and tool integration, which will be beneficial for my future 
career. maintaining regular communication with sam khadivizand helped me stay on track and receive 
valuable feedback on my work. 
p - plan 
looking ahead, i plan to continue learning about jira, confluence, and other software tools used by my 
team. i will focus on improving my communication and collaboration skills to work more effectively with 
my team members. i recommend that the company prioritize automation and integration between 
software tools to enhance productivity and efficiency. this learning experience will serve me well in the 
future as i pursue a career in the technology industry. i am eager to continue learning and growing 
throughout my internship at the company.

d - describe

week 4: reporting and data analysis 
d - describe 
during this week, i worked on two data analysis tasks under the guidance of sam khadivizand. for the first 
task, we focused on the data flow from salesforce to amazon s3 to the data warehouse. we examined 
the data and discovered missing columns in the data warehouse that were present in salesforce. to 
address this, i visualized the data and identified the missing columns in excel. we also discussed strategies 
to improve the data within the data warehouse. 
for the second task, i analyzed the satisfaction levels of customers who used our service in the past 12 
months. the goal was to understand if there were any negative experiences among customers and, if so, 
how we could resolve them. we examined various aspects of their journey, such as urgency, convenience, 
document delivery, reasons for dissatisfaction, and timelines. additionally, we sought to understand the 
sources of customer acquisition and their subsequent interactions. 
throughout these tasks, i maintained regular communication with sam to gain a deeper understanding of 
the analysis process and how to perform better. 
i - interpret 
working on these data analysis tasks provided valuable insights into the data analysis process. i learned 
how to identify missing data and visualize it for better comprehension. additionally, i gained an 
appreciation for the importance of effective communication with team members to learn and improve. 
analyzing customer expectations provided me with a deeper understanding of their journey and how it 
can be enhanced. it also reinforced the significance of data analysis in informing business decision-making. 
e - evaluate 
overall, i found these assignments to be highly effective in achieving the intended goals. working under 
the guidance of sam allowed me to grasp the process better and learn from his expertise. analyzing the 
data and identifying missing columns in the data warehouse helped improve the data quality and enhance 
the reporting process. analyzing customer satisfaction levels enabled us to understand their journey and 
identify areas for improvement. 
p - plan 
looking ahead, i plan to continue learning and advancing my data analysis skills. i will strive to 
communicate more effectively with team members to learn from their experiences and knowledge. i 
recommend ongoing improvements to the data warehouse by incorporating missing columns and 
enhancing the reporting process. i will also continue analyzing the customer journey and identifying areas 
for improvement to provide better service to our customers. 
week 5: data analysis and learning from mistakes 
d - describe: 
during week 5 of my internship, i had the opportunity to present the report i had prepared in week 4 to 
my supervisor, sam. i received feedback on my findings and areas that needed improvement. it was my 
first experience working with actual data and creating a report, and i made several mistakes. i had focused 
too much on making the report visually appealing and included unnecessary data and figures. as a result, 
i had to redo my work and create a report that focused on answering the specific questions and 
requirements. 
i - interpret: 
reflecting on this experience, i realized the importance of understanding the purpose of the report and 
tailoring it to meet the needs of the audience. sam's feedback helped me recognize that simplicity and 
clarity were crucial in conveying the information effectively. i also understood that data analysis is not just 
about showcasing technical skills but also about delivering actionable insights. 
e - evaluate: 
in evaluating the effectiveness and efficiency of my work, i acknowledged that my initial approach was 
misguided. by focusing on unnecessary elements, i had obscured the main findings and made the report 
less impactful. however, through the feedback received, i understood the need to streamline my work and 
present the information concisely and clearly. 
p - plan: 
moving forward, i plan to apply the lessons learned from this experience to improve my future reports 
and presentations. i will prioritize the core message and ensure that the data and analysis are presented 
in a manner that is easily understood by the intended audience. i will also seek regular feedback from my 
supervisor and peers to continually enhance my skills as a data analyst. 
by analysing my own performance, evaluating the impact of my work, and making connections with other 
experiences, i aim to enhance my learning and contribute effectively to the organization. this reflective 
process will help me grow as a learner and develop a deeper understanding of data analysis concepts 
taught in my courses.

e - evaluate 
by and large, i found week 6 to be a productive and quick week. the errands doled out to me required a

week 7: exploring amazon cloud  
d - describe: 
during week 7 of my internship, i was assigned the task of reviewing the amazon services used by our 
company. my responsibilities included identifying the services in use, understanding their purpose, 
determining the data sources, and assessing the authorization levels associated with each service. 
additionally, i had to analyze the cost implications of these services and report my findings to sam, my 
supervisor. 
i - interpret: 
throughout the week, i conducted thorough research on the various amazon services employed by our 
organization. i gathered information by reading relevant documentation, exploring the services' 
functionalities, and discussing them with colleagues. as a result, i gained valuable insights into the 
different applications and their significance within our company's infrastructure. this task allowed me to 
make connections between my previous learning experiences and the practical implementation of cloud 
services. 
e - evaluate: 
based on my observations, i found the utilization of amazon services to be efficient and well-integrated 
into our workflows. the services provided scalable solutions for our data processing and storage needs. 
however, i also noticed that some services were costing the company a significant amount of money. this 
evaluation led me to suggest implementing a lifecycle rule to optimize costs, recommending the 
discontinuation of services that hadn't been utilized in the past 15 days. furthermore, i proposed the use 
of a vpn for enhanced security and advised against relying heavily on cloud-hosted applications, 
suggesting a shift towards data center apps instead. 
p - plan: 
the knowledge and experience gained through this task will prove beneficial in several ways. firstly, 
understanding the amazon services employed by our organization will allow me to contribute more 
effectively to future projects that rely on these technologies. secondly, the insights i gained regarding cost 
optimization and security measures will serve as valuable recommendations for enhancing our company's 
operational efficiency. lastly, this learning experience has broadened my understanding of cloud services, 
which will be invaluable as i pursue a career in the field of computing. 
 
in conclusion, week 7 of my internship provided me with the opportunity to delve into the amazon 
services utilized by our company. through objective description, interpretation of events, evaluation of 
effectiveness, and planning for future utility, i not only expanded my knowledge but also contributed 
actionable recommendations to improve our organization's utilization of these services. 
week 8: feedback and intro to amazon glue 
d - describe: 
during week 8 of my internship, i received feedback from sam, regarding the reports and findings i had 
submitted in week 7. sam provided valuable insights and suggestions for improvement, highlighting areas 
where i had excelled and areas that required further attention. in addition to the feedback, sam assigned 
me a new task related to amazon glue, a vital component of our project. to proceed with this task, i 
needed to understand the scheduled tasks within amazon glue and its functionality. as i had previous 
experience with data analysis from week 4, i also revisited the process of data storage and pre-processing. 
i - interpret: 
upon receiving feedback from sam, i carefully considered the suggestions provided. sam's feedback 
allowed me to reflect on my work in week 7 and identify areas where i could enhance the quality of my 
reports and findings. i appreciated the constructive criticism as it guided me toward improvement and 
helped me align my work with the expectations of the organization. moreover, being assigned a task 
related to amazon glue gave me an opportunity to further develop my expertise in data processing and 
analysis. i revisited the concepts and techniques learned in week 4 and applied them to gain a deeper 
understanding of how data is stored and pre-processed using amazon glue. this process enabled me to 
utilize my previous analysis work and generate relevant insights for the upcoming task. 
e - evaluate: 
based on sam's feedback, i evaluated the effectiveness of my work in week 7. the feedback highlighted 
areas where my analysis and reporting were strong, providing evidence of my ability to comprehend and 
present complex information. however, there were also areas that required improvement, such as 
enhancing the clarity and organization of my findings. regarding the task involving amazon glue, i found 
it to be an efficient and powerful tool for managing and processing data. the integration of my prior 
analysis with amazon glue allowed me to gather meaningful insights and generate actionable 
recommendations. i sought feedback from sam to ensure that my analysis aligned with the project's 
objectives and met the expectations of the organization. 
 
5 yash week 8 , fig, confirming the data and replicating the task on confluence page. 
p - plan: 
the feedback received from sam will be immensely valuable in guiding my future work. it has provided 
me with clear directions on areas where i can refine my reporting skills, ensuring that my future reports 
are comprehensive, well-structured, and aligned with the organization's requirements. the task involving 
amazon glue has expanded my knowledge and proficiency in data processing, enabling me to contribute 
more effectively to the ongoing project. by seeking feedback from sam, i ensure that my analysis aligns 
with the project goals and enhances the overall value of the work. 
 
in conclusion, week 8 of my internship was marked by the feedback received from sam on my reports and 
findings from week 7. this feedback served as a catalyst for growth and improvement, guiding me toward 
higher-quality outputs. additionally, the introduction of a new task involving amazon glue allowed me to 
apply my prior knowledge of data analysis and gain a deeper understanding of data storage and pre-
processing within the amazon ecosystem. by evaluating the effectiveness of my work and seeking 
feedback from sam, i can plan and execute future tasks with increased competence and alignment with 
the organization's objectives. 
week 9: identifying duplicate data 
d - describe: 
during week 9 of my internship, i focused on exploring the data warehouse and analyzing the data sources 
from where we were retrieving information. as part of my assigned task, i was required to identify 
instances where data was recorded twice at the destination. specifically, i had to pinpoint cases where the 
same data was being recorded from multiple data sources, leading to unnecessary utilization of amazon 
services. to accomplish this, i relied on the analysis conducted in previous weeks and utilized my report, 
as well as the feedback received, to guide my approach. 
i - interpret: 
in this week's task, i delved into the data warehouse and thoroughly examined the various data sources 
connected to it. drawing on the analysis and understanding gained from previous weeks, i sought to 
identify duplicate data entries originating from multiple sources. this exercise required careful observation 
and comparison of the data received from various sources, particularly focusing on date-related data. by 
leveraging the insights and recommendations provided in my previous report, i was able to apply a 
systematic approach to detect and highlight instances of duplicate data recording. 
e - evaluate: 
the task of identifying duplicate data within the data warehouse proved to be effective in uncovering 
instances where data was being recorded redundantly. by implementing the analysis techniques learned 
in previous weeks, i was able to pinpoint specific cases where duplicate entries were present. this 
evaluation allowed me to gauge the impact of duplicate data on amazon services and revealed areas 
where optimization measures could be implemented to reduce unnecessary resource consumption. it also 
served as a testament to the importance of data integrity and accuracy in maintaining a streamlined and 
efficient system. 
p - plan: 
the insights gained from this task will be invaluable moving forward. by identifying duplicate data within 
the data warehouse, i can contribute to optimizing the utilization of amazon services and reducing 
associated costs. the analysis conducted will enable me to propose recommendations and strategies to 
prevent or rectify duplicate data recording, ensuring a more streamlined and efficient data management 
system. furthermore, this experience strengthens my ability to analyze data sources, identify patterns, 
and make informed decisions based on my findings. 
 
in conclusion, week 9 of my internship focused on identifying duplicate data within the data warehouse. 
through careful analysis and leveraging the knowledge and feedback from previous weeks, i successfully 
identified instances where data was recorded redundantly from multiple sources. this evaluation 
highlighted the importance of data integrity and optimization within our system. going forward, i plan to 
utilize the insights gained from this task to propose recommendations for preventing duplicate data 
recording and enhancing the overall efficiency of our data management practices. 
week 10: implementing the changes on amazon glue 
d - describe  
during week 10 of my internship, i worked closely under the supervision of sam to implement the changes 
on amazon glue. the primary focus was to ensure that the data being processed through amazon glue 
was correctly formatted and accurately reaching its destination. this task required me to carefully cross-
check the data at its destination to verify its integrity and confirm that the changes made on amazon glue 
were successful. additionally, i maintained constant communication with sam to ensure that i managed 
the company data appropriately and sought feedback to address any concerns or issues that may have 
arisen. 
i - interpret: 
throughout the week, i collaborated closely with sam to implement the necessary changes on amazon 
glue. this experience allowed me to deepen my understanding of data processing and validation within 
the system. by cross-checking the data at its destination, i ensured that the implemented changes had the 
desired effect, and that the data was in the correct format. maintaining open and regular communication 
with sam was crucial, as it allowed me to address any uncertainties and seek guidance to avoid any 
potential mishaps. moreover, i recognized the importance of effective communication and took the 
initiative to create a confluence page documenting the changes made and the associated process. this 
documentation aimed to inform new audiences about the implemented modifications and provide clarity 
on the procedures involved. 
e - evaluate: 
the implementation of changes on amazon glue and the subsequent cross-checking of data proved to be 
effective in ensuring the accuracy and proper formatting of information. through regular communication 
with sam, i was able to navigate potential pitfalls and mitigate any risks associated with handling company 
data. the documentation created on the confluence page served as a valuable resource for sharing 
knowledge and enabling others to understand the implemented changes and associated processes. this 
evaluation highlighted the significance of effective communication and proper documentation in 
maintaining data integrity and facilitating a smooth transition for future users. 
p - plan: 
the knowledge gained from implementing changes on amazon glue and maintaining effective 
communication with sam will prove instrumental in my future endeavours. the firsthand experience of 
working with data processing systems and ensuring data integrity will enhance my skills in handling similar 
tasks in the future. additionally, the understanding i gained from documenting the process on the 
confluence page will enable me to effectively share my knowledge and contribute to the growth of the 
organization. the importance of constant communication and feedback will remain at the forefront of my 
approach, ensuring that i continue to manage company data responsibly and effectively collaborate with 
team members. 
 
in conclusion, week 10 of my internship was marked by the implementation of changes on amazon glue 
under the supervision of sam. by cross-checking the data at its destination, maintaining communication 
with sam, and creating documentation on the confluence page, i ensured the accuracy and proper 
formatting of the data. the evaluation of this experience highlighted the importance of effective 
communication, documentation, and diligence in maintaining data integrity. moving forward, i plan to 
apply the knowledge gained in future projects, further enhance my communication skills, and contribute 
to the organization's growth by sharing my expertise through documentation and collaboration. 
week 11: making tableau report 
d - describe: 
during week 11 of my internship, i focused on implementing the feedback provided by sam. this involved 
making necessary adjustments and improvements based on the feedback received to enhance the quality 
and effectiveness of my work. additionally, i commenced working on a tableau report to showcase the 
data in the data warehouse. alongside this, i also undertook the task of creating a report analyzing the 
performance of partnerships and the sources from which we obtained leads. the objective of this report 
was to provide insights into potential clients and their conversion into business opportunities, which in 
turn generates revenue for the company. furthermore, i aimed to create a report that could be easily 
understood by non-technical individuals and accessible to anyone. the report would be updated on a daily 
basis to ensure up-to-date information. 
i - interpret: 
during week 11, i carefully reviewed the feedback provided by sam and implemented the necessary 
changes to enhance the quality and effectiveness of my work. this process allowed me to continuously 
improve and refine my skills. as i began working on the tableau report, i leveraged my knowledge of data 
visualization techniques to present the data from the data warehouse in a visually appealing and 
informative manner. simultaneously, i embarked on the task of creating a report analyzing the 
performance of partnerships and the sources of leads. this report aimed to provide valuable insights into 
the effectiveness of different partnership strategies and identify the most successful lead generation 
sources. to ensure the report was accessible to a wider audience, i made a conscious effort to present the 
information in a non-technical manner, using clear and concise language. 
 
6, yash week 11, fig documentation of the work done in the project. 
e - evaluate: 
the implementation of feedback from sam allowed me to refine my work and ensure its alignment with 
expectations. the tableau report enabled me to effectively present data from the data warehouse, making 
it visually appealing and easy to understand. by analyzing the performance of partnerships and lead 
sources, i aimed to provide valuable insights to the company. the evaluation of this report's effectiveness 
and efficiency relied on its ability to provide clear and actionable information to decision-makers. 
moreover, by making the report accessible to non-technical individuals, i ensured that a broader audience 
could understand and utilize the insights generated. the daily updates of the report ensured that 
stakeholders had access to the most up-to-date information, enabling timely decision-making. 
p - plan: 
the implementation of sam's feedback and the creation of the tableau report and analysis on partnership 
performance and lead sources will contribute to my professional growth. the adjustments made based on 
feedback will improve the quality of my work and enhance my skillset. the experience gained from working 
on tableau and data visualization will prove valuable in future data presentation tasks. additionally, the 
report on partnership performance and lead sources will provide actionable insights to the company, 
assisting in decision-making and resource allocation. the ability to create reports accessible to non-
technical individuals and regularly update them demonstrates effective communication and transparency. 
 
in conclusion, week 11 of my internship was characterized by implementing feedback, working on a 
tableau report to highlight data from the data warehouse, and creating an analysis report on partnership 
performance and lead sources. the evaluation and implementation of feedback allowed for continuous 
improvement of my work. the tableau report aimed to present data in an informative and visually 
appealing manner, while the analysis report provided valuable insights into partnership effectiveness and 
lead generation sources. making the reports accessible to non-technical individuals and updating them 
daily ensured effective communication and timely decision-making. moving forward, the skills and 
experiences gained during this week will contribute to my professional growth and ability to present data 
in a meaningful and accessible way. 
week 12: end of the project 
d - describe: 
during week 12 of my internship, i focused on improving the tableau report that i had created in week 
11. the feedback received from sam highlighted areas that needed attention, prompting me to make 
necessary adjustments to enhance the report's quality. additionally, i took on the task of documenting the 
tableau report on the confluence page. this documentation aimed to provide a comprehensive overview 
of the report's purpose, methodology, and key findings. furthermore, i added comments within the 
tableau report itself to make it more accessible to new audiences, providing explanations and context for 
various elements and data presented. alongside these tasks, i diligently verified the accuracy of the data 
displayed in the tableau report by comparing it with the data sourced from the data warehouse. any 
discrepancies or mismatched data were promptly reported back to sam for further investigation and 
resolution. 
 
7 tableau report at the end of the project which confirms the data and gives us the insight 
i - interpret: 
during week 12, i actively addressed the feedback i received on the initial tableau report from week 11. 
this process allowed me to refine the report, incorporating improvements suggested by sam to enhance 
its quality and effectiveness. the documentation of the tableau report on the confluence page involved 
providing a detailed account of the report's purpose, methodology, and findings. by doing so, i aimed to 
ensure that new audiences could understand and navigate the report easily. additionally, the comments 
added within the tableau report were intended to provide clarity and context, helping readers 
comprehend the presented data and visualizations. verifying the accuracy of the data displayed in the 
tableau report was essential to ensure its reliability and validity. this step involved cross-referencing the 
data with the source in the data warehouse and promptly reporting any inconsistencies or discrepancies 
to sam. 
e - evaluate: 
implementing the feedback received on the initial tableau report significantly improved its quality and 
functionality. the adjustments made based on sam's suggestions enhanced the report's effectiveness in 
conveying the intended insights and information. documenting the report on the confluence page 
facilitated knowledge sharing within the organization and made it easily accessible to a wider audience. 
the inclusion of comments within the tableau report itself improved its readability and comprehension, 
enabling readers to understand the data and visualizations more effectively. verifying the accuracy of the 
data displayed in the report ensured its reliability and added value to the decision-making process. the 
prompt reporting of any data discrepancies or mismatches to sam demonstrated a commitment to data 
integrity and contributed to maintaining high data quality standards. 
p - plan: 
the experiences gained during week 12 will be highly beneficial for my future professional development. 
implementing feedback, documenting reports, and verifying data accuracy are essential skills in data 
analysis and reporting. the improvements made to the tableau report and the documentation process 
will serve as valuable references for similar tasks in the future. furthermore, the ability to effectively 
communicate and present data in a clear and accessible manner is a highly sought-after skill in the industry. 
the commitment to data accuracy and integrity will contribute to maintaining high-quality standards in 
my work. overall, the skills and experiences gained in week 12 will enhance my capabilities as a data 
professional and facilitate my growth in the field. 
in conclusion, week 12 of my internship involved refining the tableau report created in week 11 based on 
feedback received from sam. the documentation of the report on the confluence page and the addition 
of comments within the tableau report itself aimed to improve accessibility and comprehension for new 
audiences. verifying the accuracy of the data displayed in the report ensured its reliability and validity. the 
evaluation of these events highlighted the effectiveness of the implemented changes and the efficiency in 
communicating valuable insights. the skills and experiences gained during week 12 will serve as a 
foundation for future reporting tasks.

team collaborates with a team in india, considering factors like time differences and providing access to 
remote team members.

meeting with the ceo and gaining insights into the company's trade show operations was truly 
enlightening. the abundance of data collected from various sources and its strategic utilization in driving 
marketing efforts has left a profound impression on me. moreover, witnessing the coordination efforts 
between product teams in different countries underscored the significance of effective communication 
and collaboration in a global business environment. this experience has heightened my awareness of the 
interconnectedness of different departments within a company and how they work in synergy to achieve 
common goals. 
e - evaluate 
in the overall evaluation, i found this week's experiences to be highly compelling and instrumental in 
fulfilling the objectives of my internship. engaging with the ceo and other team members greatly 
enhanced my understanding of the company's trade show and its inner workings. learning about the 
various data sources and their utilization by the marketing team demonstrated the immense potential of 
data-driven marketing initiatives. the coordination efforts of the product team further emphasized the 
importance of communication and collaboration in a global business context. 
p - plan 
moving forward, i intend to utilize the knowledge gained this week to enhance my performance as a 
learner and make more meaningful contributions to the company's success. i recommend that carclarity 
continues to prioritize communication and collaboration efforts among different departments and teams, 
especially those working remotely. additionally, i believe that further analysis of the data collected from 
diverse sources will lead to even more effective marketing endeavors. this learning experience will 
undoubtedly serve me well in my future pursuit of a career in the business world. i am enthusiastic about 
the continued learning and growth opportunities that my internship at carclarity holds.

children.text:
week 2 reflective journal: learning jira, confluence, and integrating slack with jira 
d - describe 
during the second week of my internship, i focused on learning about jira and confluence, two important 
software tools used by my team. i spent time exploring the features and functionalities of these tools to 
understand how data is collected, processed, and utilized within the company. i also integrated slack with 
jira to enable the generation of issues and tickets through slack, including all the necessary details to 
address any problems or bugs. to achieve this, i had to customize a checkbox in slack by modifying the 
json file. additionally, i maintained regular communication with sam khadivizand to receive feedback and 
update 
him 
on 
my 
progress.
 
figure 2: jira & slack issue generation check box 
i – interpret 
gaining knowledge about jira and confluence provided me with a better understanding of how my team 
tracks and manages project tasks, issues, and bugs. integrating slack with jira was a new experience for 
me, and it helped me grasp the concept of automation and integration between different software tools. 
collaborating closely with sam khadivizand improved my communication skills and allowed me to receive 
valuable feedback on my work. overall, this experience highlighted the importance of learning new 
software tools and being open to different ways of working. 
e - evaluate 
i found the second week to be a valuable learning experience in terms of achieving my internship goals. 
by gaining hands-on experience with jira and confluence, i expanded my skill set and gained a better 
understanding of my team's workflow. although integrating slack with jira presented some challenges, it 
provided me with insights into automation and tool integration, which will be beneficial for my future 
career. maintaining regular communication with sam khadivizand helped me stay on track and receive 
valuable feedback on my work. 
p - plan 
looking ahead, i plan to continue learning about jira, confluence, and other software tools used by my 
team. i will focus on improving my communication and collaboration skills to work more effectively with 
my team members. i recommend that the company prioritize automation and integration between 
software tools to enhance productivity and efficiency. this learning experience will serve me well in the 
future as i pursue a career in the technology industry. i am eager to continue learning and growing 
throughout my internship at the company.

children.name: week 4: reporting
children.text:
week 4: reporting and data analysis 
d - describe 
during this week, i worked on two data analysis tasks under the guidance of sam khadivizand. for the first 
task, we focused on the data flow from salesforce to amazon s3 to the data warehouse. we examined 
the data and discovered missing columns in the data warehouse that were present in salesforce. to 
address this, i visualized the data and identified the missing columns in excel. we also discussed strategies 
to improve the data within the data warehouse. 
for the second task, i analyzed the satisfaction levels of customers who used our service in the past 12 
months. the goal was to understand if there were any negative experiences among customers and, if so, 
how we could resolve them. we examined various aspects of their journey, such as urgency, convenience, 
document delivery, reasons for dissatisfaction, and timelines. additionally, we sought to understand the 
sources of customer acquisition and their subsequent interactions. 
throughout these tasks, i maintained regular communication with sam to gain a deeper understanding of 
the analysis process and how to perform better. 
i - interpret 
working on these data analysis tasks provided valuable insights into the data analysis process. i learned 
how to identify missing data and visualize it for better comprehension. additionally, i gained an 
appreciation for the importance of effective communication with team members to learn and improve. 
analyzing customer expectations provided me with a deeper understanding of their journey and how it 
can be enhanced. it also reinforced the significance of data analysis in informing business decision-making. 
e - evaluate 
overall, i found these assignments to be highly effective in achieving the intended goals. working under 
the guidance of sam allowed me to grasp the process better and learn from his expertise. analyzing the 
data and identifying missing columns in the data warehouse helped improve the data quality and enhance 
the reporting process. analyzing customer satisfaction levels enabled us to understand their journey and 
identify areas for improvement. 
p - plan 
looking ahead, i plan to continue learning and advancing my data analysis skills. i will strive to 
communicate more effectively with team members to learn from their experiences and knowledge. i 
recommend ongoing improvements to the data warehouse by incorporating missing columns and 
enhancing the reporting process. i will also continue analyzing the customer journey and identifying areas 
for improvement to provide better service to our customers.

children.name: week 5: data
children.text:
week 5: data analysis and learning from mistakes 
d - describe: 
during week 5 of my internship, i had the opportunity to present the report i had prepared in week 4 to 
my supervisor, sam. i received feedback on my findings and areas that needed improvement. it was my 
first experience working with actual data and creating a report, and i made several mistakes. i had focused 
too much on making the report visually appealing and included unnecessary data and figures. as a result, 
i had to redo my work and create a report that focused on answering the specific questions and 
requirements. 
i - interpret: 
reflecting on this experience, i realized the importance of understanding the purpose of the report and 
tailoring it to meet the needs of the audience. sam's feedback helped me recognize that simplicity and 
clarity were crucial in conveying the information effectively. i also understood that data analysis is not just 
about showcasing technical skills but also about delivering actionable insights. 
e - evaluate: 
in evaluating the effectiveness and efficiency of my work, i acknowledged that my initial approach was 
misguided. by focusing on unnecessary elements, i had obscured the main findings and made the report 
less impactful. however, through the feedback received, i understood the need to streamline my work and 
present the information concisely and clearly. 
p - plan: 
moving forward, i plan to apply the lessons learned from this experience to improve my future reports 
and presentations. i will prioritize the core message and ensure that the data and analysis are presented 
in a manner that is easily understood by the intended audience. i will also seek regular feedback from my 
supervisor and peers to continually enhance my skills as a data analyst. 
by analysing my own performance, evaluating the impact of my work, and making connections with other 
experiences, i aim to enhance my learning and contribute effectively to the organization. this reflective 
process will help me grow as a learner and develop a deeper understanding of data analysis concepts 
taught in my courses.

children.name: week 7: exploring
children.text:
week 7: exploring amazon cloud  
d - describe: 
during week 7 of my internship, i was assigned the task of reviewing the amazon services used by our 
company. my responsibilities included identifying the services in use, understanding their purpose, 
determining the data sources, and assessing the authorization levels associated with each service. 
additionally, i had to analyze the cost implications of these services and report my findings to sam, my 
supervisor. 
i - interpret: 
throughout the week, i conducted thorough research on the various amazon services employed by our 
organization. i gathered information by reading relevant documentation, exploring the services' 
functionalities, and discussing them with colleagues. as a result, i gained valuable insights into the 
different applications and their significance within our company's infrastructure. this task allowed me to 
make connections between my previous learning experiences and the practical implementation of cloud 
services. 
e - evaluate: 
based on my observations, i found the utilization of amazon services to be efficient and well-integrated 
into our workflows. the services provided scalable solutions for our data processing and storage needs. 
however, i also noticed that some services were costing the company a significant amount of money. this 
evaluation led me to suggest implementing a lifecycle rule to optimize costs, recommending the 
discontinuation of services that hadn't been utilized in the past 15 days. furthermore, i proposed the use 
of a vpn for enhanced security and advised against relying heavily on cloud-hosted applications, 
suggesting a shift towards data center apps instead. 
p - plan: 
the knowledge and experience gained through this task will prove beneficial in several ways. firstly, 
understanding the amazon services employed by our organization will allow me to contribute more 
effectively to future projects that rely on these technologies. secondly, the insights i gained regarding cost 
optimization and security measures will serve as valuable recommendations for enhancing our company's 
operational efficiency. lastly, this learning experience has broadened my understanding of cloud services, 
which will be invaluable as i pursue a career in the field of computing. 
 
in conclusion, week 7 of my internship provided me with the opportunity to delve into the amazon 
services utilized by our company. through objective description, interpretation of events, evaluation of 
effectiveness, and planning for future utility, i not only expanded my knowledge but also contributed 
actionable recommendations to improve our organization's utilization of these services.

however, i also noticed that some services were costing the company a significant amount of money. this 
evaluation led me to suggest implementing a lifecycle rule to optimize costs, recommending the 
discontinuation of services that hadn't been utilized in the past 15 days. furthermore, i proposed the use 
of a vpn for enhanced security and advised against relying heavily on cloud-hosted applications, 
suggesting a shift towards data center apps instead. 
p - plan: 
the knowledge and experience gained through this task will prove beneficial in several ways. firstly, 
understanding the amazon services employed by our organization will allow me to contribute more 
effectively to future projects that rely on these technologies. secondly, the insights i gained regarding cost 
optimization and security measures will serve as valuable recommendations for enhancing our company's 
operational efficiency. lastly, this learning experience has broadened my understanding of cloud services, 
which will be invaluable as i pursue a career in the field of computing. 
 
in conclusion, week 7 of my internship provided me with the opportunity to delve into the amazon 
services utilized by our company. through objective description, interpretation of events, evaluation of 
effectiveness, and planning for future utility, i not only expanded my knowledge but also contributed 
actionable recommendations to improve our organization's utilization of these services.

children.name: week 8: feedback
children.text:
week 8: feedback and intro to amazon glue 
d - describe: 
during week 8 of my internship, i received feedback from sam, regarding the reports and findings i had 
submitted in week 7. sam provided valuable insights and suggestions for improvement, highlighting areas 
where i had excelled and areas that required further attention. in addition to the feedback, sam assigned 
me a new task related to amazon glue, a vital component of our project. to proceed with this task, i 
needed to understand the scheduled tasks within amazon glue and its functionality. as i had previous 
experience with data analysis from week 4, i also revisited the process of data storage and pre-processing. 
i - interpret: 
upon receiving feedback from sam, i carefully considered the suggestions provided. sam's feedback 
allowed me to reflect on my work in week 7 and identify areas where i could enhance the quality of my 
reports and findings. i appreciated the constructive criticism as it guided me toward improvement and 
helped me align my work with the expectations of the organization. moreover, being assigned a task 
related to amazon glue gave me an opportunity to further develop my expertise in data processing and 
analysis. i revisited the concepts and techniques learned in week 4 and applied them to gain a deeper 
understanding of how data is stored and pre-processed using amazon glue. this process enabled me to 
utilize my previous analysis work and generate relevant insights for the upcoming task. 
e - evaluate: 
based on sam's feedback, i evaluated the effectiveness of my work in week 7. the feedback highlighted 
areas where my analysis and reporting were strong, providing evidence of my ability to comprehend and 
present complex information. however, there were also areas that required improvement, such as 
enhancing the clarity and organization of my findings. regarding the task involving amazon glue, i found 
it to be an efficient and powerful tool for managing and processing data. the integration of my prior 
analysis with amazon glue allowed me to gather meaningful insights and generate actionable 
recommendations. i sought feedback from sam to ensure that my analysis aligned with the project's 
objectives and met the expectations of the organization. 
 
5 yash week 8 , fig, confirming the data and replicating the task on confluence page. 
p - plan: 
the feedback received from sam will be immensely valuable in guiding my future work. it has provided 
me with clear directions on areas where i can refine my reporting skills, ensuring that my future reports 
are comprehensive, well-structured, and aligned with the organization's requirements. the task involving 
amazon glue has expanded my knowledge and proficiency in data processing, enabling me to contribute 
more effectively to the ongoing project. by seeking feedback from sam, i ensure that my analysis aligns 
with the project goals and enhances the overall value of the work. 
 
in conclusion, week 8 of my internship was marked by the feedback received from sam on my reports and 
findings from week 7. this feedback served as a catalyst for growth and improvement, guiding me toward 
higher-quality outputs. additionally, the introduction of a new task involving amazon glue allowed me to 
apply my prior knowledge of data analysis and gain a deeper understanding of data storage and pre-
processing within the amazon ecosystem. by evaluating the effectiveness of my work and seeking 
feedback from sam, i can plan and execute future tasks with increased competence and alignment with 
the organization's objectives.

children.name: week 9
children.text: week 9
children.goal: week 9

children.name: week 9: identifying
children.text:
week 9: identifying duplicate data 
d - describe: 
during week 9 of my internship, i focused on exploring the data warehouse and analyzing the data sources 
from where we were retrieving information. as part of my assigned task, i was required to identify 
instances where data was recorded twice at the destination. specifically, i had to pinpoint cases where the 
same data was being recorded from multiple data sources, leading to unnecessary utilization of amazon 
services. to accomplish this, i relied on the analysis conducted in previous weeks and utilized my report, 
as well as the feedback received, to guide my approach. 
i - interpret: 
in this week's task, i delved into the data warehouse and thoroughly examined the various data sources 
connected to it. drawing on the analysis and understanding gained from previous weeks, i sought to 
identify duplicate data entries originating from multiple sources. this exercise required careful observation 
and comparison of the data received from various sources, particularly focusing on date-related data. by 
leveraging the insights and recommendations provided in my previous report, i was able to apply a 
systematic approach to detect and highlight instances of duplicate data recording. 
e - evaluate: 
the task of identifying duplicate data within the data warehouse proved to be effective in uncovering 
instances where data was being recorded redundantly. by implementing the analysis techniques learned 
in previous weeks, i was able to pinpoint specific cases where duplicate entries were present. this 
evaluation allowed me to gauge the impact of duplicate data on amazon services and revealed areas 
where optimization measures could be implemented to reduce unnecessary resource consumption. it also 
served as a testament to the importance of data integrity and accuracy in maintaining a streamlined and 
efficient system. 
p - plan: 
the insights gained from this task will be invaluable moving forward. by identifying duplicate data within 
the data warehouse, i can contribute to optimizing the utilization of amazon services and reducing 
associated costs. the analysis conducted will enable me to propose recommendations and strategies to 
prevent or rectify duplicate data recording, ensuring a more streamlined and efficient data management 
system. furthermore, this experience strengthens my ability to analyze data sources, identify patterns, 
and make informed decisions based on my findings. 
 
in conclusion, week 9 of my internship focused on identifying duplicate data within the data warehouse. 
through careful analysis and leveraging the knowledge and feedback from previous weeks, i successfully 
identified instances where data was recorded redundantly from multiple sources. this evaluation 
highlighted the importance of data integrity and optimization within our system. going forward, i plan to 
utilize the insights gained from this task to propose recommendations for preventing duplicate data 
recording and enhancing the overall efficiency of our data management practices.

children.name: week 10
children.text: week 10
children.goal: week 10

children.name: week 10: implementing
children.text:
week 10: implementing the changes on amazon glue 
d - describe  
during week 10 of my internship, i worked closely under the supervision of sam to implement the changes 
on amazon glue. the primary focus was to ensure that the data being processed through amazon glue 
was correctly formatted and accurately reaching its destination. this task required me to carefully cross-
check the data at its destination to verify its integrity and confirm that the changes made on amazon glue 
were successful. additionally, i maintained constant communication with sam to ensure that i managed 
the company data appropriately and sought feedback to address any concerns or issues that may have 
arisen. 
i - interpret: 
throughout the week, i collaborated closely with sam to implement the necessary changes on amazon 
glue. this experience allowed me to deepen my understanding of data processing and validation within 
the system. by cross-checking the data at its destination, i ensured that the implemented changes had the 
desired effect, and that the data was in the correct format. maintaining open and regular communication 
with sam was crucial, as it allowed me to address any uncertainties and seek guidance to avoid any 
potential mishaps. moreover, i recognized the importance of effective communication and took the 
initiative to create a confluence page documenting the changes made and the associated process. this 
documentation aimed to inform new audiences about the implemented modifications and provide clarity 
on the procedures involved. 
e - evaluate: 
the implementation of changes on amazon glue and the subsequent cross-checking of data proved to be 
effective in ensuring the accuracy and proper formatting of information. through regular communication 
with sam, i was able to navigate potential pitfalls and mitigate any risks associated with handling company 
data. the documentation created on the confluence page served as a valuable resource for sharing 
knowledge and enabling others to understand the implemented changes and associated processes. this 
evaluation highlighted the significance of effective communication and proper documentation in 
maintaining data integrity and facilitating a smooth transition for future users. 
p - plan: 
the knowledge gained from implementing changes on amazon glue and maintaining effective 
communication with sam will prove instrumental in my future endeavours. the firsthand experience of 
working with data processing systems and ensuring data integrity will enhance my skills in handling similar 
tasks in the future. additionally, the understanding i gained from documenting the process on the 
confluence page will enable me to effectively share my knowledge and contribute to the growth of the 
organization. the importance of constant communication and feedback will remain at the forefront of my 
approach, ensuring that i continue to manage company data responsibly and effectively collaborate with 
team members. 
 
in conclusion, week 10 of my internship was marked by the implementation of changes on amazon glue 
under the supervision of sam. by cross-checking the data at its destination, maintaining communication 
with sam, and creating documentation on the confluence page, i ensured the accuracy and proper 
formatting of the data. the evaluation of this experience highlighted the importance of effective 
communication, documentation, and diligence in maintaining data integrity. moving forward, i plan to 
apply the knowledge gained in future projects, further enhance my communication skills, and contribute 
to the organization's growth by sharing my expertise through documentation and collaboration.

children.name: week 11
children.text: week 11
children.goal: week 11

children.name: week 11: making
children.text:
week 11: making tableau report 
d - describe: 
during week 11 of my internship, i focused on implementing the feedback provided by sam. this involved 
making necessary adjustments and improvements based on the feedback received to enhance the quality 
and effectiveness of my work. additionally, i commenced working on a tableau report to showcase the 
data in the data warehouse. alongside this, i also undertook the task of creating a report analyzing the 
performance of partnerships and the sources from which we obtained leads. the objective of this report 
was to provide insights into potential clients and their conversion into business opportunities, which in 
turn generates revenue for the company. furthermore, i aimed to create a report that could be easily 
understood by non-technical individuals and accessible to anyone. the report would be updated on a daily 
basis to ensure up-to-date information. 
i - interpret: 
during week 11, i carefully reviewed the feedback provided by sam and implemented the necessary 
changes to enhance the quality and effectiveness of my work. this process allowed me to continuously 
improve and refine my skills. as i began working on the tableau report, i leveraged my knowledge of data 
visualization techniques to present the data from the data warehouse in a visually appealing and 
informative manner. simultaneously, i embarked on the task of creating a report analyzing the 
performance of partnerships and the sources of leads. this report aimed to provide valuable insights into 
the effectiveness of different partnership strategies and identify the most successful lead generation 
sources. to ensure the report was accessible to a wider audience, i made a conscious effort to present the 
information in a non-technical manner, using clear and concise language. 
 
6, yash week 11, fig documentation of the work done in the project. 
e - evaluate: 
the implementation of feedback from sam allowed me to refine my work and ensure its alignment with 
expectations. the tableau report enabled me to effectively present data from the data warehouse, making 
it visually appealing and easy to understand. by analyzing the performance of partnerships and lead 
sources, i aimed to provide valuable insights to the company. the evaluation of this report's effectiveness 
and efficiency relied on its ability to provide clear and actionable information to decision-makers. 
moreover, by making the report accessible to non-technical individuals, i ensured that a broader audience 
could understand and utilize the insights generated. the daily updates of the report ensured that 
stakeholders had access to the most up-to-date information, enabling timely decision-making. 
p - plan: 
the implementation of sam's feedback and the creation of the tableau report and analysis on partnership 
performance and lead sources will contribute to my professional growth. the adjustments made based on 
feedback will improve the quality of my work and enhance my skillset. the experience gained from working 
on tableau and data visualization will prove valuable in future data presentation tasks. additionally, the 
report on partnership performance and lead sources will provide actionable insights to the company, 
assisting in decision-making and resource allocation. the ability to create reports accessible to non-
technical individuals and regularly update them demonstrates effective communication and transparency. 
 
in conclusion, week 11 of my internship was characterized by implementing feedback, working on a 
tableau report to highlight data from the data warehouse, and creating an analysis report on partnership 
performance and lead sources. the evaluation and implementation of feedback allowed for continuous 
improvement of my work. the tableau report aimed to present data in an informative and visually 
appealing manner, while the analysis report provided valuable insights into partnership effectiveness and 
lead generation sources. making the reports accessible to non-technical individuals and updating them 
daily ensured effective communication and timely decision-making. moving forward, the skills and 
experiences gained during this week will contribute to my professional growth and ability to present data 
in a meaningful and accessible way.

children.name: week 12
children.text: week 12
children.goal: week 12

children.name: week 12: end
children.text:
week 12: end of the project 
d - describe: 
during week 12 of my internship, i focused on improving the tableau report that i had created in week 
11. the feedback received from sam highlighted areas that needed attention, prompting me to make 
necessary adjustments to enhance the report's quality. additionally, i took on the task of documenting the 
tableau report on the confluence page. this documentation aimed to provide a comprehensive overview 
of the report's purpose, methodology, and key findings. furthermore, i added comments within the 
tableau report itself to make it more accessible to new audiences, providing explanations and context for 
various elements and data presented. alongside these tasks, i diligently verified the accuracy of the data 
displayed in the tableau report by comparing it with the data sourced from the data warehouse. any 
discrepancies or mismatched data were promptly reported back to sam for further investigation and 
resolution. 
 
7 tableau report at the end of the project which confirms the data and gives us the insight 
i - interpret: 
during week 12, i actively addressed the feedback i received on the initial tableau report from week 11. 
this process allowed me to refine the report, incorporating improvements suggested by sam to enhance 
its quality and effectiveness. the documentation of the tableau report on the confluence page involved 
providing a detailed account of the report's purpose, methodology, and findings. by doing so, i aimed to 
ensure that new audiences could understand and navigate the report easily. additionally, the comments 
added within the tableau report were intended to provide clarity and context, helping readers 
comprehend the presented data and visualizations. verifying the accuracy of the data displayed in the 
tableau report was essential to ensure its reliability and validity. this step involved cross-referencing the 
data with the source in the data warehouse and promptly reporting any inconsistencies or discrepancies 
to sam. 
e - evaluate: 
implementing the feedback received on the initial tableau report significantly improved its quality and 
functionality. the adjustments made based on sam's suggestions enhanced the report's effectiveness in 
conveying the intended insights and information. documenting the report on the confluence page 
facilitated knowledge sharing within the organization and made it easily accessible to a wider audience. 
the inclusion of comments within the tableau report itself improved its readability and comprehension, 
enabling readers to understand the data and visualizations more effectively. verifying the accuracy of the 
data displayed in the report ensured its reliability and added value to the decision-making process. the 
prompt reporting of any data discrepancies or mismatches to sam demonstrated a commitment to data 
integrity and contributed to maintaining high data quality standards. 
p - plan: 
the experiences gained during week 12 will be highly beneficial for my future professional development. 
implementing feedback, documenting reports, and verifying data accuracy are essential skills in data 
analysis and reporting. the improvements made to the tableau report and the documentation process 
will serve as valuable references for similar tasks in the future. furthermore, the ability to effectively 
communicate and present data in a clear and accessible manner is a highly sought-after skill in the industry. 
the commitment to data accuracy and integrity will contribute to maintaining high-quality standards in 
my work. overall, the skills and experiences gained in week 12 will enhance my capabilities as a data 
professional and facilitate my growth in the field. 
in conclusion, week 12 of my internship involved refining the tableau report created in week 11 based on 
feedback received from sam. the documentation of the report on the confluence page and the addition 
of comments within the tableau report itself aimed to improve accessibility and comprehension for new 
audiences. verifying the accuracy of the data displayed in the report ensured its reliability and validity. the 
evaluation of these events highlighted the effectiveness of the implemented changes and the efficiency in 
communicating valuable insights. the skills and experiences gained during week 12 will serve as a 
foundation for future reporting tasks.
